name: 50 Years to the Kyivmiskbud
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to 50th anniversary of the Kyivmiskbud (Design & Construction Company), which works for preserving and adorning of the architectural face of the city of Kyiv
averseDescription: On the coin obverse in its centre there is depicted the small National Emblem of Ukraine, beneath - 2005, the coin issue year; around the coin circumference there are the inscriptions: НАЦІОНАЛЬНИЙ БАНК УКРАЇНИ (National Bank of Ukraine) (above), ДВІ ГРИВНІ (2/ hryvnia) (beneath) and the Mint logotype of the National Bank of Ukraine.
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there are structures, built by the Kyivmiskbud company, among which in the foreground there is a building of the Southern railway station
